string.value: Another New Skill for Night Walker
I better ask #b#p1101006##k about this new skill per comments from #p1101002#.

#p1101006#told me that if I wanted to learn a new skill, I'll have to prove my skills again by entering #bHall #4#k at #m130020000#, where a tougher test will take place... \n\n#i4032128# #t4032128# #b#c4032128# / 1#k
I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032128# in return. #p1101006# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill and taught me Venom.

What? A new skill? Is it #p1101002# again? Seriously, I don't know what he's thinking... anyway, you won't even listen to me if I tell you that the skill isn't for you, so... as long as you pass the test, you'll learn the skill.
Head over to #bthe 4th Drill Hall#k of #m130020000#, pass the test that's given to you, and bring back #b#t4032128##k so I can teach you the new skill.
Eh? You seem to have lost a bit of edge...
Wow, you did bring #t4032128#. I knew you were capable of doing it. Okay, now that you've proven that you deserve to learn the skill, here it is.
I have just taught you a new skill for the Night Walkers, #bVenom#k. Don't overuse it.
Ah, were you not able to find #b#t4032128##k...? You can get it at #bthe 4th Drill Hall#k of #m130020000#. Of course, you know that it's the getting part that's the hardest.
